document.full_text: a small south carolina sea island family farm that has tapped the growing agriculture tourism market in order to survive has launched its "rent-a-chick" program just in time for easter.
document.title: family farm's rent-a-chick program helps it survive
lines_and_colors: a small south carolina sea island family farm that has tapped the growing agriculture tourism market in order to survive has launched its "rent-a-chick" program just in time for easter.
